text: Nassarius priscardi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae, the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks. ==Description== The shell grows to a length of 16 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Indian Ocean off Madagascar. ==References== Category:Nassariidae Category:Gastropods described in 2006
title: Nassarius priscardi
